contents.text: Selects an enemy up to 20 blocks away. Creates a circle around that player. If the player leaves the circle, you get +40% Q charge.

This ability is a percentage-based charge. You get 1% charge every second passively. Using R, you can get overcharge (above 100% charge), which will deplete back to 100% at a moderate speed. Activating Q grants Speed III, Jump Boost II and +50% damage for 10 seconds. Additionally, the cooldown for F gets shortened to 1s.
